===Etymology===
From an earlier /chimi mauryau/ (which became /chimi moːryoː/). A compound of {{compound|魑魅|tr1=chimi|t1=mountain and forest demon|魍魎|tr2=mōryō|t2=mountain stream and tree spirit|lang=ja}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|ちみもうりょう|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ちみもうりょう|hhira=ちみまうりやう}}

# demons and spirits of [[river]]s and [[mountain]]s
